column6:
"HOBGOBLIN",2005,4
Young Harry Osborn has come to believe that his friend, Peter Parker, killed his father Norman when Peter was Spider-Man. Now, Harry plans a horrifying, misguided vengeance that could end Peter's life. Prepare for the battle of Spider-Man and the Hobgoblin!! Will either survive this epic encounter? Part 4 & 5 (of 6).
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.25
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
